Sentencas: In order to improve the electrical conductivity of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) interconnect coatings, a series of Cedoped (Mn,Co)3O4 (Mn1.5-xCo1.5-xCe2xO4+delta, x = 0, 0.025, 0.05, and 0.1) coatings are prepared.
Titulo: Ce-doped (Mn,Co)3O4 coatings for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: The chemical composition, lattice structures, morphology, electrical properties, and weight gain of the coatings are characterized.
Titulo: Ce-doped (Mn,Co)3O4 coatings for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: Experimental results show that doping Ce lowers the area-specific resistance of (Mn,Co)3O4 coatings from 6.83 to 2.62 m omega cm2 at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Ce-doped (Mn,Co)3O4 coatings for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity improvement can be attributed to the ion substitution by Ce3+ that turns (Mn,Co)3O4 into (Mn,Co)2CeO4, an N-type semiconductor with a higher electrical carrier density.
Titulo: Ce-doped (Mn,Co)3O4 coatings for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: However, the coatings with heavier doping of Ce exhibit more structural defects due to the lattice parameter reduction and volume shrinkage, which weaken the oxidation resistance of the coatings.
Titulo: Ce-doped (Mn,Co)3O4 coatings for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: This study verifies that doping Ce can effectively improve the electrical conductivity of spinel coatings.
Titulo: Ce-doped (Mn,Co)3O4 coatings for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: The negative influence of doping Ce can be mitigated by modifying the coating preparation technique or by changing the SOFC operating temperature.
Titulo: Ce-doped (Mn,Co)3O4 coatings for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications
